pageProduct.name: Seven Wonders Moroccan Argan Oil Shampoo 250ml
pageProduct.description:
Â 

General Information

Certified Organic Argania Spinosa Kernel (Argan) Oil:

  • Seven Wonders Organic Argan Oil is cold pressed from the fruit of the Argan tree - native to the south of Morocco.
  • Its know as the 'Miracle ingredient' to hair professionals and celebrities.
  • Some of its amazing qualities include:
    • - Naturally Rich in Vitamin E, F, A & C
    - Rich in Omega 6
    - Rich in Essential Fatty Acids
    - Antioxidant Properties
    - Squalene - Natural Moisturiser
    - Versatile - for use on all hair and skin types

MOROCCAN ARGAN OIL SHAMPOO

  • In keeping with the amazing versatility of the Moroccan Treatment Oil, Seven Wonders has developed a sulphate free shampoo that harnesses the incredible power of Argan Oil to thoroughly cleanse, hydrate, protect and nourish all hair types.
  • It has an amazing oil-balancing feature which hydrates dry hair and spreads and balances excess in oily hair.
  • Sulfate & paraben free
  • For all hair types
